snippet.title: Lifestyle Hotel close to Ostbahnhof

snippet.title: Berlin hotel with panoramic windows
snippet.text: An urban oasis of sleek design and intuitive service, located between Potsdamer Platz & Kudamm.

snippet.title: Central location in Friedrichstrasse
snippet.text: WIFI free of charge. Online check-in. Exclusive area The Level with additional services and amenities. Underground parking.
